body.p: The gear pump uses two identical gears rotating against each other. One gear is driven by a motor and it in turn drives the other gear. Each gear is supported by a shaft with bushings on both sides of the gear.

section.title: Drive Gear (Rotor)
section.p: The drive gear in the gear pump is the gear that is driven by the motor.

section.title: Idler Gear
section.p: The idler gear is the gear that is driven by the drive gear.
